ygData.subject: how to crawl ajax enabled content
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Is there any ready setting that I can apply in order to crawl ajax enabled webpages/contents, for example, asp.net paging with supported ajax posting.

Hi all,

Is there any ready setting that I can apply in order to crawl ajax=
 enabled webpages/contents, for example, asp.net paging with supported ajax=
 posting.

Since the paged contents are retrieved through http-post, I wond=
er if I can get the info by tweaking the query string / url.

Thanks for yo=
ur info in advance. Good day ahead.

Regards, William.
